item.description:
Hi Ladies,

Ok, this is extreme fun. Bring some cash, because you will want to pick up something. Last week I bought an old rotary phone. My son never saw one before...uggh...LOL. I can't wait to hook it up, my new place will be complete!

We can eat at Stone Soup after we shop! Hoping for a nice day like this past weekend!

When I get sign-ups I will let you know where we will meet.

Laura

group.name: Women Supporting Women Through Life's Incredible Journeys

item.name: Flea Market (without the fleas) Todd Farm, Rowley
